column2: The  preliminary  investigation,  work  in  connection  with  the  disciplinary
proceedings and the formal disciplinary inquiry against an officer retired

subject 
to  Section  12  of 
the  Pensions  Minute  should  be  held  and
concluded  by  the  Disciplinary  Authority  irrespective  of  the  retirement  of

the  officer. 
In  such  an 
instance,  the  Disciplinary  Authority  should  be
guided by the provisions of this Code.
